freeEvent.title: Free Event
freeEvent.description: This event is free to attend. No payment required.

freeEventRegistration.title: Register for Free Event
freeEventRegistration.marketingOptIn: I agree to receive marketing communications
freeEventRegistration.registrationSuccessMessage: You have been registered for this free event. Check your email for confirmation.

seatSelection.ticketSoldOut: Unfortunately, the selected tickets are no longer available. Please select different seats or check back later.
seatSelection.infoStep1: Enter your details to verify your email and secure your seat selection.
seatSelection.infoStep2: We'll send a verification code to your email for security.
seatSelection.infoStep3: Complete payment to receive your digital tickets instantly.
seatSelection.privacyText: Your information is encrypted and used only for ticket delivery and event management. We never share your personal data with third parties.
seatSelection.otpExplanation: OTP (One-Time Password) is a secure 8-digit code sent to your email to verify your identity and complete the seat reservation process.
seatSelection.reservationActive: ‚úÖ Your selected seats are temporarily reserved for 10 minutes
seatSelection.reservationNote: ‚è∞ Complete verification within this time to secure your booking
seatSelection.reservationExpiry: ‚ùå Reservation expires if OTP verification is not completed
seatSelection.securityPoint2: üìß Verifies your email address for ticket delivery
seatSelection.securityPoint3: ‚ö° Ensures fair access to limited seats
seatSelection.nextStep1: 1. Enter the 8-digit code from your email
seatSelection.nextStep3: 3. Proceed to payment to complete your booking
seatSelection.serviceFeeDisclaimer: Per order payment fees may apply depending on digital payment method used.
seatSelection.clickSection: Click on a section to zoom in and select seats
seatSelection.clickSeats: Click on seats to select them
seatSelection.noSeatsFound: No seats found. Please check if the venue manifest is properly configured.
seatSelection.noSeatsAvailable: No seats available. Check console for details.
seatSelection.ticketsHeld: Your tickets are now held for the next 10 minutes
seatSelection.bestAvailableDescription: We'll automatically select the best available seats for you based on your preferences.
seatSelection.seatsMustBeAdjacent: Please select seats that are adjacent to your current selection
seatSelection.cannotDeselectStranded: Cannot deselect this seat as it would leave other seats isolated. Please deselect seats in a way that keeps your selection connected.
seatSelection.maxSeatsReached: Maximum 10 seats can be selected at a time

checkout.title: Complete Your Purchase
checkout.securePaymentText: Your payment information is encrypted and secure
checkout.cardNote: Note: We only accept personal consumer credit/debit cards. Business or corporate cards are not accepted for ticket purchases.
checkout.marketingConsent: I agree to receive marketing communications and special offers from this organizer. You can unsubscribe at any time.
